item.title: Family Guy
item.description: Zombies Map. Based on a custom map from World at War (WaW) and the Family Guy series, with added improvements. It was created in two weeks.

item.title: Monsters Inc
item.description: Zombies Map. This was part of a contest by NOAHJ456 where we were given less than a month, and it is based on the movie Monsters, Inc. Doors with rooms come and go

item.title: Reef Town
item.description: Zombies Map. It was part of a contest, and the map was made in less than 2 month with the structure of Seatown from MW3. It is set in the era of piracy

item.title: Gas Station
item.description: Zombies Map. This map is based on a gas station from the game daysgone.

item.title: Laponia
item.description: Zombies Map. A remake of a World at War (WaW) map set in Lapland.

item.title: Age of Zombies
item.description: Zombies Map. A cartoon-style map set in the Old West with unique gameplay. It doesn't follow the typical Call of Duty Zombies format; there are no rounds, and supply drops containing weapons, power-ups, etc...

item.title: UDYAT
item.description: Zombies Map. This is part of a contest where, in less than a month, you had to create an initial area for a zombie map. The map is based on an excavation site in ancient Egypt.

item.title: The Simpsons' Dome
item.description: Zombies Map. A section of the Springfield city map from The Simpsons, based on the movie where they encase the city in a dome.

item.title: Five nights at Fredy
item.description: Zombies Map. A remake of the pizzeria from the first Five Nights at Freddy's game

item.title: Futurama
item.description: Zombies Map. A map set in the Planet Express building from the Futurama series.

item.title: Clahs Royale
item.description: Zombie Map. it's a remake of the royal arena from the mobile game Clash Royale

item.title: Mario kart Rainbow Road
item.description: Zombie Map. A remake of the Mario Kart circuit from Nintendo 64, artistically inspired by the one from Mario Kart 8.

item.title: Mario bros
item.description: Zombie Map. A remake, echoing with 8-bit models, attempting to recreate the level 1-1 of Super Mario Bros from 1985

item.title: Mario kart Block Fort
item.description: Zombie Map. A recreated map from the Mario Kart DS game, the Battle Map 'Block Fort'

item.title: Donkey Kong
item.description: Zombie Map. A cartoon-style tower map where you'll be ascending through floors, based on the original Donkey Kong gameplay from 1981.
